key_phrases.phrase: Do you have an appointment today?
examples: Do you have an appointment today, or is this a walk-in?
Good afternoon. Do you have an appointment today?
Welcome! Do you have an appointment today?
Yes, I do. It's under the name Johnson.
Yes, I do. I have a 3 o'clock appointment.
Yes, I do. I made it last week.
No, I don't. Can I make one now?
No, I don't. Do you have any availability today?
No, I don't. Is it possible to get a haircut without an appointment?
Can I make one for tomorrow?
Can I make one for next week?
I don't have an appointment. Can I make one now?

key_phrases.phrase: Sure, let me check our schedule.
examples: Sure, let me check our schedule for today.
Sure, let me check our schedule. What time works best for you?
Sure, let me check our schedule and see what we have available.
